text: Ojo megued, ki Iʙrohimu Ismoil va Ishoqu Ja'quʙ va naʙeragoni u ʙar dini jahudi jo nasroni ʙudand? (In duruƣi mahz ast, zero ki onho qaʙl az nuzuli Tavrot va Incil ʙa pajomʙarj maʙ'us suda ʙudand va az dunjo guzasta ʙudand). Ej Pajomʙar, ʙarojason ʙigu: «Ojo sumo donotared az dini onho jo Alloh? Ba durusti, ki dar Qur'on xaʙar doda suda ʙud, ki onho musalmononi pok az sirk ʙudand. Kist sitamgartar az kase, ki guvohiero, ki az coniʙi Alloh nazdas ast, ʙipusad!? Va Alloh az on ci ki mekuned, ʙexaʙar nest, ʙalki hisoʙgiranda va cazodihandai amalhost
